Cecily Sash (1924/1925 -2019) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nkuzi na South Africa. Ọ kụziri nka imepụta ihe na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ.
A mụrụ Cecily Sash n'afọ 1924 ma ọ bụ 1925 na Delmas, obere obodo dị na Transvaal, Union of South Africa nye nne na nna Bessie (née Liverman) na Max Sash.

Site n'afọ 1943 ruo 1946, ọ gụrụ nka na Witwatersrand Technical College Art School na Johannesburg, na-amụ ihe n'okpuru Maurice van Essche. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Chelsea Polytechnic (nke bụzi Chelsea College of Arts) na London, n'okpuru Henry Moore; na Camberwell School of Art (nke bụ ugbu a Camberwell College of Art) na Victor Pasmore. N'afọ 1954, Sash nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kụziri obere oge na Jeppe Girls São High School na Johannesburg. N'oge na-adịghị anya ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ebe ọ nọgidere ruo n'afọ 1970. N'afọ 1965, e nyere ya onyinye Oppenheimer iji gaa n'ihu na-amụ agụmakwụkwọ nka na Britain na United States. N'afọ 1974, ọ kwagara Britain, ebe ọ biri na Welsh Marches.

Sash bụ onye na-ese ihe, mana o jikwa mosaic na tapestries wee rụọ ọrụ. Ihe osise ya nwere oge dị iche iche nke gụnyere otu nke abstraction, na otu nke gburugburu ebe obibi. Sash sere ọtụtụ mgbidi South Africa nke e nyere iwu, nke gụnyere na ụlọ nchịkwa mpaghara Transvaal na Pretoria; Mahadum nke Witwatersrand; na Transvaal Institute of Architects.
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Amadlozi Group guzobere na 1961, nke gụnyere Cecil Skotnes, Edoardo Villa, Guiseppe Cattaneo, na Sydney Kumalo
A na-eji aha ahụ (Zulu: nna nna ochie) mee ihe maka iji mara omenala ihe osise nke Afrịka
N'afọ 1965, a gụnyere Sash na ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa na Grosvenor Gallery na London.
Sash nwụrụ na 2019, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na anọ.
